thread.title: Germany Probes Complaint Alleging Facebook Facilitates Incitement to Hatred
thread.title_full: Germany Probes Complaint Alleging Facebook Facilitates Incitement to Hatred - WSJ

author: Natascha Divac
title: Germany Probes Complaint Alleging Facebook Facilitates Incitement to Hatred
text:
FRANKFURT—German prosecutors are investigating a complaint alleging Facebook Inc.’s treatment of hate posts on its platform facilitates incitement to hatred against other people.
A spokeswoman for the prosecutors’ office in Hamburg said Monday that the office has opened an investigation after a lawyer brought a complaint against three managers of... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
